title: need font name pls
content:
need the name of this font nyone thxs

 [‹ "no big deal" rounded font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064445/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48159 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID the grain edit identity ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064445/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48174 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jdnyce

comments.content: [Huxley Vertical Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064445/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.htm?pid=405850) comes pretty close... only the A & E don’t seem to match but that is easily changed... I also think Huxley is free typeface! I say there is a better match I’m júst not sure what it is... but i say someone will :)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064445im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Romeo_4217.gif)

Romeo by Font Bureau is also really close.

I think [South Beach](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064445/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bagraphics/south-beach/) is close also, the only differences being the spur on the “G”, and the lack of an extending crossbar on the “A”.
Told you someone will haha! nice catch Tom!

The ’M’ is all wrong but the basic form of the letters are similar to [Trump Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122064445/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/trump-gothic/)

You’d have to modify the crossbars a bit.
